notes: The test vector for message 'a' * 2^25 is wrong in the RFC. This is a know error already published by the author on the page http://fastcrypto.org/umac/ (direct link: http://fastcrypto.org/umac/rfc4418.errata.txt ), but I am reporting it here because it is neither shown in Errata Search nor triggers the costumary "Errata Exist" alert on RFC's HTML view.
